text: Scot Alexander Breithaupt (July 14, 1957 â€“ c. July 4, 2015) was an entrepreneur, "Old School" professional Motorcycle MX and Bicycle Motocross (BMX) racer and a founding father of BMX in 1970. Breithaupt was found dead in a tent where he had been living in a vacant lot in Indio, California on July 4, 2015, aged 57. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Long Beach, California
title: Scot Breithaupt
